messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Insul gloves are illegal unless youre an engineer, it will be treated as contraband.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Power Systems Nominal

Power has been restored to Blazing Facility Fifteen. We apologize for the inconvenience.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Lifesign Alert

Unknown biological entities have been detected near Blazing Facility Fifteen, please stand-by.

messages.author: Chief Medical Officer's Desk
messages.body: I know this is a bit late, but suit sensors save lives!

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Migration Alert

Due to space-winter, a horde of energy draining parasites have stampeded into the maintenance areas.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Security Alert

Gr3y.T1d3 virus detected in Blazing Facility Fifteen door subroutines. Severity level of 3. Recommend station AI involvement.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Security Alert

Gr3y.T1d3 virus detected in Blazing Facility Fifteen door subroutines. Severity level of 1. Recommend station AI involvement.
